articles.title: About me
articles.contents:
About me



I am a biologist from Costa Rica specialized in Tropical Biology and Natural Resource Management. I did my bachelor’s and my post-bachelor’s (Licentiate) degree at Universidad Nacional in Costa Rica. I consider myself a field and computer biologist.


I spend my free time walking with Ema (my dog), reading and watching documentaries. I like spending time with my family and friends. I enjoy learning new things and doing sports like running and cycling.
